name: Special Delivery (itch) (Anita He)
description:
Deliver avian justice in this flash-game-inspired arcade game. Spot your target, aim, and give evildoers a special delivery!

Control

  • Left Arrow / A = Move Left
  • Right Arrow / D  = Move Right
  • Left Mouse Click / Space = Poop

Made for Bird Jam by: Adriana Matic, Anita He, Justin SJ, Peter Francis, Sanaa Memon
